title: LFT Jungler - Master
body: A team looking to play ocs

replies.body: Hey man! I'm making a diamond 1+ ranked 5s team for Alura Gaming, we are hoping to achieve atleast challenger on the ranked 5s ladder and ultimately make it into the opl, Ill add you in game but if you could also add me that would help a lot :)
Yo man d2promos atm gonna be playing heaps after this week cuz uni break. Hmu if things might go somewhere
hi fam chall ad here. if you get other masters/challs together hmu.
